results.title: Buddhism

Episode of Series “The Great Religions”.
A history of Buddhism and a view of the various forms which are practised throughout South East Asia.

results.title: Buck Rogers. Vol. 5
results.creator_credit: Phil Leacock, Dick Lowry, David J. O'Connell, Jock Gaynor and Universal Pictures
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Buck Rogers in the 25th century”.
In ‘Unchained woman’, The Earth Defense Directorate send Buck and Wilma on a mission to rescue Jen Burton, the partner of notorious shipping pirate Malary Pantera, from a state-of-the-art underground jail where she has been incarcerated for a murder that Pantera actually committed. Masquerading as a convict, Buck infiltrates the high-tech facility, detonates a bomb, and they break out, heading to a nearby spaceport to meet Wilma and return to Earth. However, an android prison guard damaged during the explosion begins a relentless pursuit of them, determined to uphold the law. Their situation is complicated further when a traitorous ambassador informs Malary of Jen’s escape and the Earth Directorate’s plans to use her to gain information that will ultimately lead to his arrest. It is up to Buck and Wilma to both defeat him and shut down the obsessed android before Jen is silenced forever. In ‘Planet of the Amazon women’, Buck is lured to the planet Zantia after answering a distress call from two women whose space yacht is malfunctioning. Once on the planet’s surface, he learns that there is a shortage of men on Zantia, and that he is to be sold off to the highest bidder at an auction. Purchased by the Prime Minister’s daughter Ariela, he is surprised when he discovers what her true intentions are. With Wilma leaving delicate trade negotiations to go in search of her missing friend, it is up to Buck and Ariela to overthrow her mother’s oppressive government and liberate the planet’s male population from their captors before they declare another war on Zantia. Stars Gil Gerard as Buck, Erin Gray as Col. Deering, and Tim O’Connor as Dr. Huer. Special guest Jamie Lee Curtis stars as Jen Burton in ‘Unchained woman’.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Phil Leacock, Dick Lowry, David J. O’Connell, Jock Gaynor and Universal Pictures

results.title: Bud and Lou
results.creator_credit: Robert C Thompson, Clyde B Phillips and Bob Balaban
results.brief_description: This is a biographical made for television feature length film based on the book “Bud & Lou” by Bob Thomas which attempts to portray both the personal and professional lives of the comedic partnership of Bud Abbott and Lou Costello. It follows their career from the Burlesque days, through to broadway, radio, Hollywood and eventually television, entertaining millions along the way. They were renowned for their generosity to charitable causes and were heavily involved with the War Bond drives during WWII but each had their own personal demons to deal with including Lou’s problem with gambling and Bud’s problems with drinking and epilepsy. Harvey Korman stars as Bud Abbott, Buddy Hackett as Lou Costello, and Arte Johnson plays their loyal agent Eddie Sherman. Cast also includes Michele Lee (as Lou’s wife), Robert Reed, Donald Hotton, Harry Solin.

results.title: Buffy the vampire slayer
results.creator_credit: Fran Rubel Kuzui, Howard Rosenman, Kaz Kuzui and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: Long before there was Sarah Michelle Gellar gracing out television screens as Buffy, there was Kristy Swanson in the title role - a role which she tackles admirably. Buffy - cheerleader, girlfriend, air head and popular student finds her life turned upside down when a strange man in a trench coat, Merrick (Donald Sutherland), interrupts cheerleading practice to tell her it’s time to acknowledge her birthright. For as long as there has been vampires, there’s been the slayer - one girl, hand picked out of the entire world as championing the cause against the creatures of the night. When Buffy finally accepts her fate, she is coached by Merrick to fight lead vampire Rothos (Rutger Hauer), someone who has been visiting her in her dreams. As Buffy discovers fighting capabilities she never knew she had, and realises the responsibility she now wears, she finds herself drifting away from her vacuous friends and is drawn to the elusive, older, Pike (Luke Perry). The film culminates at a dance in the gymnasium. While there are no cross over characters or actors between the movie and the series, fans of either film or television versions will enjoy the tongue in cheek horror that Buffy is synonymous for. Cast also includes Paul Reubens, David Arquette, Natasha Gregson Wagner and Hilary Swank.

results.title: Buffalo: an ecological success story
results.creator_credit: John Walker and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description: Describes the physical traits of the North American buffalo and its natural habitat, its struggle for survival from the time vast herds ranged across the continent through the mass slaughters of the 1800’s, and the measures taken to save the buffalo from extinction. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: Buffalo soldiers
results.creator_credit: Charles Haid, Gordon Wolf and Turner Pictures Worldwide
results.brief_description: A group of African-American cavalrymen ride into a desolate, racist and inhospitable frontier town. The town dishonours them, their Native American foes honour them, as Apache leader Victorio gives the soldiers a name of honour and strength, Buffalo Soldiers. The trooper’s daring hunt for Victorio (Harrison Lowe) frames this stirring tribute to the former slaves and other African- Americans of the 9th and 10th U.S Cavalry Regiments. Cast includes Danny Glover, Bob Gunton, Carl Lumbly and Glynn Turman.

results.title: Buffalo Bill and the Indians [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Robert Altman and De Laurentiis Entertainment Group
results.brief_description: Robert Altman’s “Buffalo Bill and the Indians” sardonically explores the gap between western history and legend in show biz-obsessed America. Megalomaniac “Buffalo Bill” Cody assumes the legend created for him by writer Ned Buntline, aided and abetted by his producer and his publicist, perpetuating myths of white triumph over savage “Injuns” in his Wild West show, as audiences cheer him on and buy his merchandise. But when Sitting Bull joins the troupe with his interpreter, his request for authenticity threatens to throw a wrench into the proceedings. Regardless of how Bill may feel about the facts, he must bow to the preferences of the paying public. Cast includes: Paul Newman, Joel Grey, Kevin McCarthy, Harvey Keitel, Allan Nicholls, Geraldine Chaplin, Burt Lancaster, Frank Kaquitts.

results.title: Buena vista social club
results.creator_credit: Wim Wenders, Ulrich Felsburg, Deepak Nayar, Road Movies, Kintop Pictures, ICAIC and Arte
results.brief_description: Ry Cooder went to Cuba in 1996 to meet with a group of legendary musicians of the 1930’s, 40’s and 50’s. The result was the Grammy Award winning album Buena Vista Social Club. When Cooder travelled to Cuba again in 1998 to record a solo album with Ibrahim Ferrer - again with all the musicians of the Buena Vista Social Club - Wim Wenders accompanied him with a small film crew, observing the musicians in the studio and tracing their lives in Havana.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Wim Wenders, Ulrich Felsburg, Deepak Nayar, Road Movies, Kintop Pictures, ICAIC and Arte

results.title: Budgie the little helicopter. - Volume 2.
results.creator_credit: Gary Blatchford, Michael Algar, Sarah Ferguson, Duchess of York, HTV, Fred Wolf Films and Sleepy Kid Company
results.brief_description: Budgie the little helicopter and his friends embark on four fun-filled adventures. In “The Airshow”, Budgie leads the fly past at the Harefield Airshow. Crooks try to steal a French plane called Genevieve and Budgie saves the day. A catch of lobsters almost gets the best of Budgie in “Budgie takes a catch”. Budgie gets to spend a night on an aircraft destroyer in “All at sea”. The final story “Boats, boots and Budgie” sees the intrepid helicopter rescue a cow during bad floods.
